AFAICT, my changes are not in 1.3 branch.
At master, you should only need to configure, then run bazel build with --config=mkl, and that should be it.
On 1.3, we still use the way contributed by intel. I believe this was not a very well tested build path, so it is likely this was broken all along.
I would recommend setting TF_DOWNLOAD_MKL to 1 and see if it works when configure downloads MKL itself.

body:
AFAICT, my changes are not in 1.3 branch.
At master, you should only need to configure, then run `bazel build` with `--config=mkl`, and that should be it.
On 1.3, we still use the way contributed by intel. I believe this was not a very well tested build path, so it is likely this was broken all along.
I would recommend setting `TF_DOWNLOAD_MKL` to 1 and see if it works when configure downloads MKL itself.
